subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics will have a league-high four players in the All-Star Game, with Kevin Garnett, Paul Pierce, Ray Allen and Rajon Rondo joining the East team as reserves.
snippet: The Boston Celtics will have a league-high four players in the All-Star Game, with Kevin Garnett, Paul Pierce, Ray Allen and Rajon Rondo joining the East team as reserves.
